ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] What is the equivalent deciderules for the filter URIListRegExpFilter and PathDepthFilter?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Søren, In org.archive.crawler.deciderules, see: - MatchesListRegExpDecideRule - NotMatchesListRegExpDecideRule - TooManyPathSegmentsDecideRule Take care,
